message.original:
まずは基本操作です
<COL ffdc78>移動：</COL><PADM>【左スティック】<KEYM>【<ICON KB_W><ICON KB_A><ICON KB_S><ICON KB_D>】</KEYM>
<COL ffdc78>ダッシュ：</COL><PADM>移動中【<ICON PAD_L3>ボタン】押し込み<KEYM>同じ移動キーを２回押す</KEYM>
<COL ffdc78>ジャンプ：</COL><PADM>【<ICON STG_JUMP>ボタン】<KEYM>【<ICON KB_SPACE>】</KEYM>
message.translation:
Fundamental Basics
<COL ffdc78>Movement：</COL><PADM>【Left Control Stick】<KEYM>【<ICON KB_W><ICON KB_A><ICON KB_S><ICON KB_D>】</KEYM>
<COL ffdc78>Sprint：</COL><PADM>Press the【<ICON PAD_L3>button】while moving.<KEYM>Tap the same directional key twice.</KEYM>
<COL ffdc78>Jump：</COL><PADM>【<ICON STG_JUMP>button】<KEYM>【<ICON KB_SPACE>】</KEYM>

message.original:
次にカメラ操作です
<COL ffdc78>カメラ（視点）操作：</COL><PADM>【右スティック】<KEYM>【<ICON MOUSE>】</KEYM>
<COL ffdc78>視点のリセット：</COL><PADM>【<ICON PAD_R3>ボタン】<KEYM>【<ICON MOUSE_WHL_1>】</KEYM>
<COL ffdc78>視点距離の切替：</COL><PADM>【<ICON PAD_R3>ボタン】素早く２回押し<KEYM>【<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4>前後】</KEYM>
message.translation:
Operating the Camera
<COL ffdc78>Camera Movement：</COL><PADM>【Right Control Stick】<KEYM>【<ICON MOUSE>】</KEYM>
<COL ffdc78>Reset Camera Position：</COL><PADM>【<ICON PAD_R3>button】<KEYM>【<ICON MOUSE_WHL_1>】</KEYM>
<COL ffdc78>Camera Distance：</COL><PADM>【<ICON PAD_R3>button】quickly tapped twice.<KEYM>【<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4> forwards and backwards】</KEYM>
